item.title: No Kings protests against Trump draw huge crowds across the country
item.description: Gatherings had a street carnival atmosphere as demonstrators packed Times Square in New York and lined Pennsylvania Avenue in Washington on Saturday

item.title: Putin demanded Ukraine surrender key territory in call with Trump
item.description: The demand from Putin would significantly disadvantage Ukraine and could be an obstacle to peace, officials said.
